Class JCoincheTrick

  • java.lang.Object
    • JCoincheTrick

  • public class JCoincheTrick
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class defined a unique trick composed of 4 getting cards. It will evaluate the winner of the trick and generate a temporaly trickscore for each team.

    • Method Detail

      • getTrickBeginner

        public JCoinchePlayer getTrickBeginner()
        A getter for the trickBeginner.
        Returns:
        the trickBeginner

      • run

        public void run()
        This method run until 4 cards have been set. It will send a GET_CARD Google Protocol Buffer message to a player and wait for a SET_CARD Google Protocol Buffer from the player. It will call the evaluateCards method to set the trickScore and the trick winner.
